_PAGE_FILTER_LIST_ARGUMENTS_:
# Arguments: array (Array): The array for the list [isHtml=true] (Boolean): If true, an HTML list (
  • ...
) is created. Otherwise, a text list is generated (...) [isSimpleArray=false] (Boolean): Indicates whether only a simple array without objects is used [keyChildren=""] (String): Key for child elements (only if isSimpleArray=false) [keyLabel=""] (String): Key for the text to be displayed (only if isSimpleArray=false) [keyLabelCallback] (Function): Function to generate labels with two parameters (item, itemIndex) [separator=", "] (String): Separator between elements (only if isHtml=false) [tag="ul"] (String): HTML tag for the entire list [listClass=""] (String): CSS class (a_list_without_styles)
_PAGE_FILTER_LIST_DESCRIPTION_: The function creates a list from an array.
